remarks: The span of a singleton is an additive subgroup (frequently used special case of ~ lspcl ).  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Apr-2016.)
statement:
lspsnsubg.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lspsnsubg.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` W ) $.
